articles.author: Will Schmitt
articles.title: Texas group plans stock exchange to compete with NYSE and Nasdaq - Financial Times
articles.description: TXSE chief says BlackRock and Citadel Securities are among fledgling bourse’s backers
articles.content: A fledgling Texas Stock Exchange said on Tuesday it had raised $120mn from investors including BlackRock and Citadel Securities with the aim of launching a new national rival to the New York Stock Ex… [+1913 chars]

articles.author: Patrick Wingrove
articles.title: Britain considers offering Lilly weight-loss drug on better terms than Wegovy - Reuters
articles.description: Britain's medical costs regulator on Tuesday recommended Eli Lilly's weight-loss drug Mounjaro for some patients with obesity and suggested not placing a time limit on the medicine's use as it had for rival Novo Nordisk's Wegovy.

articles.author: Anna Nicolaou, James Fontanella-Khan
articles.title: Shari Redstone leaves investors guessing as Paramount and Skydance agree merger terms - Financial Times
articles.description: Controlling shareholder of Hollywood group states ‘confidence’ in co-chiefs pitching to keep company private
articles.content: Shari Redstone left investors guessing about the potential sale of Paramount during its annual meeting and instead stated her confidence in the executives who are pitching to keep the Hollywood compa… [+2799 chars]

articles.title: Next generation tech powers Climeworks' megaton leap - Climeworks
articles.description: Climeworks reveals its latest Generation 3 direct air capture technology to scale up to megaton capacity.
articles.content:
Head start through largest testing facilities
